courses.title: BIM Fundamentals for Civil Engineers
courses.description: Comprehensive introduction to Building Information Modeling concepts, workflows, and best practices. Perfect for engineers transitioning to BIM.

courses.title: Revit Structure Professional Training
courses.description: Comprehensive introduction to Building Information Modeling and Autodesk Revit for structural engineering. Learn modeling, documentation, and collaboration techniques for efficient project delivery.

courses.title: Revit Structure Workshop - 01
courses.description: Master Autodesk Revit for Structural projects. Learn advanced modeling techniques, on Practical Project from start to end

courses.title: Revit Structure Workshop - 02
courses.description: Learn clash detection, coordination review, and 4D simulation using Autodesk Navisworks Manage.

courses.title: Revit Structure Workshop - 03
courses.description: Complete training on AutoCAD Civil 3D for site grading, corridors, pipe networks, and construction documentation.
